name: LLM Production Observability & Monitoring Platform
problem: LLMs fail in production in ways traditional ML monitoring can't detect (reasoning drift, context boundary degradation, latency spikes, cost overruns). Enterprises deploying GPT-4 or Claude have zero production visibility.
revenue: $99–999/mo tier-based SaaS + usage-based ($0.01 per 1000 logged tokens). Target: $10K MRR by month 6.
description: Real-time logging of LLM calls, pre-built eval metrics, alert system for cost/latency, simple dashboard.

name: Agentic AI for Contact Centers
problem: 50%+ of Tier-1 calls are routine. Agents spend 40% of time on low-value tasks. Average handle time 5–10 mins. Turnover 30%+/yr.
description: AI agent handles common intents (password reset, refund status), intent classification, contextual responses, sentiment monitoring.

name: AI-Powered Contract Analysis & Negotiation Agent
problem: Legal review is slow, expensive, error-prone. A 50-page contract takes 8–10 hours to review manually. High-risk clauses often missed.
revenue: $2–5K/mo SaaS for teams; $10–20K for enterprise tier. Per-firm licensing: $50K–200K/yr.
description: Upload contract; AI extracts key clauses, flags risks, compares with playbook, suggests rewording.

name: Autonomous AI for Regulatory Compliance Monitoring
problem: Compliance teams track 100+ regulations. Manual monitoring is error-prone. Regulatory changes missed.
revenue: $5K–15K/mo SaaS based on entities + jurisdictions. Enterprise: $100K–500K/yr.
description: Dashboard showing key regulations, auto-extract requirements, map to internal controls, flag gaps.

name: Synthetic Data Generation for AI Training
problem: Real training data is scarce, sensitive, and regulated. Synthetic data enables privacy-preserving ML but quality is poor.
revenue: $500–2K/mo SaaS. Enterprise: $100K–500K/yr. Usage: $0.01–0.05 per synthetic record.
description: Upload real dataset; AI analyzes structure; generate synthetic data; privacy assurance report.

name: AI for Supply Chain Predictive Analytics
problem: Demand forecasting is inaccurate. Inventory too high or too low. Supply disruptions cause cascading failures.
description: Import historical sales; AI forecasts demand; optimal inventory levels; alerts for anomalies.

name: AI-Powered Recruitment Screening
problem: Recruiters spend 40% of time on manual screening. High-volume applications unmanageable. Bias in manual screening.
revenue: $99–299/mo for SMEs. Enterprise: $10K–50K/yr. Usage: $2–5 per resume.
description: Upload resumes; auto-extract skills; match against job description; score candidates; bias report.

name: AI for Fraud Detection in Financial Transactions
problem: Fraud detection reactive. High false positive rates. Manual review expensive.
description: Real-time transaction screening; risk scoring; auto-decline high-risk; fraud pattern dashboard.

name: Edge AI Computer Vision for Retail
problem: Manual shelf checks are slow. Shrink is 1–3% of revenue. No real-time shelf visibility.
description: Real-time object detection on shelves; stockout alerts; anomaly detection.

name: Multimodal AI for Healthcare Diagnostics
problem: Clinicians diagnose based on isolated signals. Missing patterns from multimodal integration.
description: Upload imaging + notes + labs; AI extracts features; multimodal fusion; risk scoring.
